summary: Implemented a Switch Account/logout flow via a new confirmation dialog and a useSwitchAccount hook that clears offline IndexedDB data, clears React Query cache, and calls the existing Internet Identity hook clear(); added a Switch Account action in TopBar and wired it into Dashboard, Add Sale, Add Expense, Daily Summary, and Monthly Goal screens. App resets to Welcome when unauthenticated.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified IndexedDB implementation details and introduced an `idb` dependency (package.json) beyond the explicit logout/switch-account requirements.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on using existing Internet Identity `clear()` and clearing offline queue/optimistic store + React Query cache; it does not request adding a new IndexedDB library dependency or broader offline storage refactors.
